name: Good Morning 2018
description:
Good Morning 2018 is a statement game about gun violence in the U.S., made by Rachel Singh.

The data was last pulled November 20th, 2018.

Repository: On BitBucket

Credits

Data from Gun Violence Archive.org

Background images are from Pexels.com

  • Nubia Navarro
